start.text: You wake up in a mysterious forest. The sunlight barely penetrates the dense canopy. The air is fresh, but there's an eerie silence. What do you do?

choices.text: Stay where you are and observe

explore_forest.text: As you walk deeper into the forest, you hear the distant sound of running water and see a narrow path leading to a village. Which path will you take?

choices.text: Take the path to the village
Climb a nearby tree to get a better view

stay_put.text: You sit quietly, listening to the forest. After a while, you notice a small, curious animal approaching you. What will you do?

choices.text: Ignore the animal and start exploring

follow_water.text: You follow the sound of water and find a beautiful, clear stream. The water looks refreshing. What will you do?

drink_water.text: The water is cool and refreshing. You feel revitalized and ready to continue your journey. What will you do next?

rest_stream.text: You rest by the stream, feeling the cool breeze and listening to the soothing sounds of water. You feel rejuvenated. What will you do next?

follow_stream.text: Following the stream, you discover a hidden waterfall with a cave behind it. What will you do?

explore_cave.text: You enter the cave and find ancient markings on the walls. It feels like a place of power. What will you do?

investigate_markings.text: The markings tell a story of an ancient civilization and a hidden treasure guarded by a mystical creature. What will you do?

search_treasure.text: You follow the clues from the markings and find a hidden chamber with a chest full of gold and jewels. What will you do?

take_treasure.text: As you take the treasure, the ground shakes and a mystical creature appears, guarding the exit. What will you do?

leave_treasure.text: You decide to leave the treasure and continue your journey, respecting the ancient guardians. What will you do next?

fight_creature.text: You prepare to fight the creature, using all your strength and cunning. What will you do?

choices.text: Try to reason with the creature

try_escape.text: You try to escape, but the creature blocks your path. You must find another way. What will you do?

attack_creature.text: You attack the creature with all your might. After a fierce battle, you manage to defeat it and escape with the treasure. What will you do next?

reason_creature.text: You try to reason with the creature, explaining that you mean no harm and are only seeking knowledge. What will you do?

choices.text: The creature understands and lets you pass
The creature attacks, leaving you no choice but to fight

hidden_exit.text: You find a hidden exit in the cave and manage to escape with your life, but without the treasure. What will you do next?

creature_understands.text: The creature understands your intentions and allows you to leave with a piece of the treasure as a token of friendship. What will you do next?

enjoy_waterfall.text: You enjoy the serenity of the waterfall, feeling at peace with nature. What will you do next?

choices.text: Explore the cave behind the waterfall

enter_village.text: You are greeted by friendly villagers who offer you food and shelter. They tell you stories of the forest. What will you do?

choices.text: Stay and listen to more stories
Thank them and explore the village

village_stories.text: The villagers tell you about hidden treasures and ancient secrets of the forest. What will you do?

explore_village.text: You explore the village and find it full of life and history. The villagers are kind and welcoming. What will you do?

choices.text: Leave the village and return to the forest

ask_treasures.text: The villagers tell you about hidden treasures buried deep in the forest. They give you a map. What will you do?

ask_secrets.text: The villagers reveal ancient secrets and mystical tales about the forest. What will you do?

stay_village.text: You decide to stay in the village, enjoying the hospitality and learning about the villagers' way of life. What will you do next?

follow_map.text: The map leads you to a hidden treasure chest filled with gold and jewels. What will you do?

investigate_secrets.text: You discover hidden truths about the forest and its magical properties. What will you do?

climb_tree.text: You climb the tree and get a better view of the surroundings. You spot a mountain in the distance. What will you do?

choices.text: Climb down and continue exploring the forest

continue_exploring.text: You discover a beautiful clearing with a sparkling stream. The water looks inviting. What will you do?

follow_animal.text: The animal leads you to a hidden grove with ancient trees and a mystical aura. What will you do?

explore_grove.text: The grove is filled with magical energy. You feel a strong connection with nature. What will you do?

meditate_grove.text: You meditate in the grove, feeling a deep sense of peace and enlightenment. What will you do?

explore_grove_further.text: You find a hidden passage in the grove leading to a secret chamber filled with ancient artifacts. What will you do?

investigate_artifacts.text: The artifacts reveal ancient knowledge and magical powers. What will you do?

mountain_path.text: You head towards the mountain, finding a path that leads to its base. The journey is challenging. What will you do?

choices.text: Set up camp at the base

climb_mountain.text: You climb the mountain and reach the top, where you find a breathtaking view and a hidden temple. What will you do?

camp_base.text: You set up camp at the base of the mountain, preparing for the climb ahead. What will you do?

choices.text: Climb the mountain in the morning

explore_temple.text: The temple is filled with ancient relics and mystical symbols. What will you do?

enjoy_view.text: You enjoy the breathtaking view from the top of the mountain, feeling a sense of accomplishment. What will you do?

descend_mountain.text: You descend the mountain, feeling accomplished and ready for new adventures. What will you do next?

stay_rest.text: You rest and enjoy the view for a while longer, feeling rejuvenated. What will you do next?

explore_surroundings.text: You explore the area around the base of the mountain, discovering interesting flora and fauna. What will you do?

keep_exploring_surroundings.text: You discover more interesting flora and fauna around the mountain. What will you do?

use_artifacts.text: You use the artifacts to unlock hidden powers and protect the forest. What will you do next?

leave_artifacts.text: You decide to leave the artifacts and continue your adventure. What will you do next?

use_knowledge.text: You use the knowledge to help the villagers and protect the forest. What will you do next?

keep_secret.text: You decide to keep the knowledge a secret and continue your adventure. What will you do next?

meditate_temple.text: You meditate in the temple, feeling a deep sense of peace and enlightenment. What will you do?

investigate_relics.text: The relics reveal ancient powers and knowledge. What will you do?

meditate_longer_temple.text: You feel a profound sense of peace and connection with the universe. What will you do?

use_relics.text: You use the relics to gain wisdom and protect the forest. What will you do next?

leave_temple.text: You leave the temple, feeling enlightened and ready for new adventures. What will you do?
